text: Jyare a loko anathi nirasa tha'i gaya to ekantamam besi salaha-sucana karava lagya, amam je sauthi moto hato tene kahyum ke, tamane khabara nathi ke tamara pita'e tamari pasethi allahana soganda la'i pakum vacana lidhum che ane a pahela yusupha vise tame bedarakari kari cukaya cho. Basa! Hum to ahinyathi nahim ja'um, jyam sudhi ke pitaji pote mane paravanagi na ape, athava allaha ta'ala mari a babate phensalo na kari de, te ja uttama phensalo karanara che
